title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 21 ยง 5901.10 - Award monitoring
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 21 ยง 5901.10 - Award monitoring

State Regulations

The office shall require in the agreement between the office
and the regional high technology development organization receiving the award
that: (a) periodic progress reports
shall be submitted to the office; and
(b) periodic financial reports shall be
submitted to the office, including reports concerning the equivalent
expenditure of matching funds. Notes

R. & Regs. Tit. 21

5901.10

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
